message.body: ############### Dinner to celebrate after all my moving is done, ok? :-)

Thanks! Dinner would be awesome! Let me know when you are settled. Also let me know if u need help with anything in the evenings. I'm not much of a mover but I can assist with basic tasks like unpacking or painting (with some supervision of course)
Maybe you can come over and help me drink all the booze I moved over from ######'s ;-) ha ha
Perfect! Something I can do even without supervision!
